data.title: Fedorov Victor Fedorovich - Director For Sales Marketing, Senior Sales Manager On Sales & Marketing. at LUKOIL Romania
data.meta_description: Fedorov Victor Fedorovich has worked in several prominent companies in the oil and petroleum industry.
data.text:
Fedorov Victor Fedorovich has worked in several prominent companies in the oil and petroleum industry. FEDOROV started their career at Rosneft as a Sales Representative in 2014, where they played a significant role in the company's presence in the Central Federal District and its export activities. FEDOROV then joined LUKOIL in 2018 as a Director for Sales Marketing and Senior Sales Manager on Sales & Marketing. In this role, they focused on extending oil production, sales, and export worldwide. Currently, Fedorov holds a position as a Senior Executive at LLP Asia Global Service Kazakhstan, where they are responsible for trading operations and the efficient sale and supply of oil and petroleum products.

Victor Fedorov had studied at Moscow State Institute of International Relations (University) MFA Russia MGIMO from 1991 to 1996. FEDOROV attained a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration and Management, General during this period.
